alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:11AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida through 845 AM CDT... At 810 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Blountstown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Altha, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Red Oak, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Chason, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Kennys Mill, Center Lake, Willis, Nettle Ridge, Frink, Blountstown Airport and Macedonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
